Toolbox for organoids analyses using drug screening and RNA-sequencing

Pascal Belleau, Astrid Deschênes and Alexander Krasnitz

Source: vignettes/OrganoidsToolBox.Rmd

Introduction

Installation

To install the latest version accessible on the OrganoidsToolBox Github Website, the devtools package is required.

## Load required package
library(devtools)

## Install the latest version of OrganoidsToolBox
devtools::install_github('KrasnitzLab/OrganoidsToolBox')
